src:
Filip Stanisavljević izvadio Radnik iz bule! Nenad Lukić na deobi prvog mesta liste strelaca Superlige
Spartak slavio u Kruševcu, Napredak promašio penal, Čuka bez poraza 13 utakmica

03 Nov 2019


Mesec i kusur traje superligaška nepobedivost Voždovca. Otkako je 25. septembra u odloženoj utakmici trećeg kola položio oružje pred Crvenom zvezdom (1:3) tim iz Zaplanjske ulice igra u velikom stilu, ređa pobede, ali je u 15. rundi ostao bez dva viđena boda, iako se činilo da do završnice meča u Surdulici ima sva tri boda u džepu.

No, Radnik se nije predavao ni dok je bio u debelom minusu, a ekipu trenera Nenada Vanića je „iz bule“ izvadio Filip Stanisavljević. Nekadašnji internacionalac u Grčkoj najpre je u 86. minutu prepolovio zaostatak, da bi u dubokoj nadoknadi asistirao ukrajinskom rezervisti, Jegvenu Pavlovu i ostavio makar poen domaćinu (2:2). Posle svega viđenog – puna kapa.
Na taj način u drugi plan je Stanisavljević potisnuo Alena Mašovića, iako je krilni vezista Zmajeva u drugom poluvremenu dvaput matirao Nikolu Vujanca, potvrdivši da zajedno sa ekipom „raste“. Stigao je Mašović do petog pogotka u sezoni, što ga uz još dve asistencije čini jednim od učinkovitijih igrača prve etape našeg prvenstva, ali je na kraju morao da se zadovolji samo poenom. Na poslednjih šest utakmica od mogućih 18 uzeo čak 14 bodova, što mu je dovoljno za skok na šesto mesto tabele.
Nedovoljno, pak, da ugrozi TSC, jer je novajlija iz Bače Topole definitivno ostavio krizu za leđima i eliminaciju od lučanske Mladosti, praćenu samo jednim bodom na poslednja tri ligaška susreta, nadoknadio pobedom nad niškim Radničkim. I u Senti je odluka u nastavku, Nenad Lukić je demonstrirao kakav je centarfor i seriju pogodaka nastavio protiv aktuelnog vicešampiona. Dvaput je Lukić prevario Nikolu Petrovića i sa devet golova stigao Stefana Mihajlovića – danas bez učinka –  na čelu liste strelaca elitnog ranga.



Od ostalih rezultata valja izdvojiti da je Spartak posle četiri vezana poraza u gostima konačno uzeo ceo plen. Na gostovanju Napretku Plave golubove je do trijumfa doveo Stefan Šormaz, mada su Kruševljani posle isključenja Ivana Đokića propustili idealnu priliku za izjednačenje, s obzirom da najbolji timski strelac Igor Ivanović nije realizovao kazneni udarac u 61. minutu.
Posle slavlja nad Partizanom u vanrednom kolu, Čukarički je seriju nepoberdivosti na stadionu Mačve produžio na čak 13 utakmica!

SRBIJA 1 - 15. KOLO: 


Subota

Partizan - Vojvodina 4:0 (2:0)/Natho 29 pen, 43, Zdjelar 48, Sadik 69/
Prolter - Crvena zvezda 0:2 (0:0)/Garsija 59, Boaći 82/

Nedelja

Inđija - Javor 2:3 (0:1)/Rajevac 47, Amanović 49 ag - Kolaković 31, Petković 80 i 90/

Nedelja

Inđija - Javor 2:3 (0:1)/Rajevac 47, Amanović 49 ag - Kolaković 31, Petković 80, 90/
TSC - Radnički Niš 2:0 (0:0)/Lukić 47, 80/
Mačva – Čukarčki 0:0
Napredak - Spartak 0:1 (0:1)/Šromaz 28/
Rad – Mladost 0:0
Radnik – Voždovac 2:2 (0:0)/Stanisavlejvić 86, Pavlov 90+3 - Mašović 48, 72/





Pogledajte novu epizodu serije Ekipizza...





FOTO: Star sport
text:
Filip Stanisavljevic takes Worker out of the bull! Nenad Lukic in the first place in the Superliga scorer list
Spartak celebrated in Krusevac, Napredak missed penalty, Chuka lost 13 matches without a loss

03 Nov 2019


The super-league invincibility of Vozdovac lasts for months and months. Ever since he laid down his weapons in front of Red Star (1: 3) in the postponed game of the third round on September 25, the Zaplanjska street team has been playing in grand style, winning less often, but in the 15th round, it lost two points, although it seemed that it was until the final match in Surdulica has all three points in the pocket.

However, the worker did not give up even when he was in the thick of the minus, and the team of coach Nenad Vanic was taken out of the bull by Filip Stanisavljevic. The former international in Greece first halved the gap in the 86th minute to assist in deep compensation to the Ukrainian reservist, Yevgeny Pavlov, and leave at least a point to the host (2: 2). After all that was seen - full cap.
In this way, Stanisavljevic suppressed Alen Mašović, although the Dragon midfielder twice matured Nikola Vujanac in the second half, confirming that he and his team were “growing up”. Masovic reached the fifth goal of the season, which, with two more assists, made him one of the more efficient players in the first leg of our championship, but in the end he only had to settle for a point. In the last six games of the possible 18 he has taken as many as 14 points, which is enough for him to jump to sixth place in the table.
It is not enough to endanger TSC, as the newcomer from Baca Topola has definitely left a crisis behind his back and elimination from Lučani Mladost, followed by only one point in the last three league matches, topped by a victory over Nis Radnicki. And in Senta, the decision is below, Nenad Lukic demonstrated what kind of centerfold and hit streak he went on against the current vice-champion. Twice, Lukic fooled Nikola Petrovic and scored nine goals with Stefan Mihajlovic - today without effect - at the top of the elite rankings list.



Of the other results, it is worth mentioning that after four away defeats, Spartak finally took the whole spoils. The guest of Napredak Blue dove was led by Stefan Šormaz in triumph, although after the exclusion of Ivan Đokić, the Kruševljans missed an ideal opportunity to equalize, since the best team scorer Igor Ivanović did not realize a penalty kick in the 61st minute.
After celebrating Partizan in the extraordinary round, Cukaricki extended his unbeaten streak at Machva Stadium to as many as 13 games!

SERBIA 1 - 15TH ROUND:


Saturday

Partizan - Vojvodina 4: 0 (2: 0) / Natho 29 pen, 43, Zdjelar 48, Sadik 69 /
Prolter - Crvena Zvezda 0: 2 (0: 0) / Garcia 59, Boaci 82 /

Sunday

Indjija - Javor 2: 3 (0: 1) / Rajevac 47, Amanovic 49 ag - Kolakovic 31, Petkovic 80 i 90 /

Sunday

Indjija - Javor 2: 3 (0: 1) / Rajevac 47, Amanovic 49 ag - Kolakovic 31, Petkovic 80, 90 /
TSC - Radnicki Nis 2: 0 (0: 0) / Lukic 47, 80 /
Mačva - Čukarčki 0: 0
Napredak - Spartak 0: 1 (0: 1) / Sromaz 28 /
Rad - Mladost 0: 0
Radnik - Vozdovac 2: 2 (0: 0) / Stanisavlevic 86, Pavlov 90 + 3 - Masovic 48, 72 /
